wikipedia_page.main: Peter George Wood (born 29 September 1951 in Manchester) is an English former first-class cricketer active 1981 who played for Nottinghamshire.He was active Lancashire League and was the all-time leading run-maker for Rawtenstall.

response: * Sir Peter Wood (born c. 1946), founder of insurance companies Direct Line and Esure

* Peter Wood (footballer, born 1939), Australian rules football player for Footscray
